headline: What Bunge Global (BG)'s Share Cancellation And Capital Band Reset Means For Shareholders
summary: In December 2025, Bunge Global SA reduced its share capital by cancelling 12,382,610 repurchased shares, updating its Articles of Association and Swiss capital band to align with the new equity structure. This move tightens Bunge Global’s capital base and clarifies its governance framework, which can matter for how investors assess balance-sheet efficiency and control. We’ll now examine how Bunge Global’s share capital reduction and revised capital band shape the existing investment...
